artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Mitan; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Artist: after Charpentier; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers unbound with two hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress and one black and white engraving of a candelabra (P.15,182, P.15,183, P.15,184)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Quatorzième Cahier, 30 Mars 1787
